sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_68
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: GW_Read_Adaption_0x04FB ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1493 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1497 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1444 The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to read the status of DID 0x04FB Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren, by means of the 0x22 ReadDataByIdentifier as defined in GW_Anpassungen:
in case the KRM is not active, value "0" shall be returned (62 04 FB 00), in case the KRM is active, value "1" shall be returned (62 04 FB 01).
Read request: 22 04 FB
Remark: 0x22 is allowed in all sessions
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_68 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_72
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: GW_Write_Adaption_0x04FB ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1363 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1368 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 198 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 708 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1045 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1259 The Chorus shall store the value of DID 0x04FB in a reset-proof manner in Non-Volatile Memory. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_72 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_128
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1241 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1173 The Chorus shall ensure, that Roller Test Mode can be restored after KL-15 change based on state stored in NVM.
Note: Therefore the KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv shall only set according to 0x04FB when KL15 was switched on after startup of CRoute, refer to KRM_127. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_128 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_120
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 199 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1445 Continental shall ensure, that ICAS1 units which are delivered to Volkswagen have the DID 0x04FB equal to 0x00 [KRM is not active]. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_120 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_127
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: updateKRMSignals ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 689 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 992 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 605 The Chorus shall forward the status of the 0x04FB to DNH (and AB_CAN) by means of the signal KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv := according to the state of adaption 0x04FB.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_127 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_90
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 796 Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1065 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_Motor50_u16_Rpms ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1130 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1369 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 766 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 821 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 908 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1260 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1500 KRM Activation Request
The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to activate the Roller Test Mode (set the DID 0x04FB - Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren to value '1'), by means of service 0x2E WriteDataByIdentifier, when the following preconditions are satisfied:
KL15 is equal to ON AND KL30 Voltage is in Operating Voltage Range "c" (UBmin = 9.0V and UBmax = 16.0V as defined in ยง4.7 [VW 80000]) AND Signal ESP_v_Signal is equal to 0 AND Signal MO_QBit_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 (value: [gueltiger_Wert]) AND Signal MO_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 AND Signal ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren is equal to 0 (value: [keine_Aenderung]) AND NOT in timeout.
Request to write: 2E 04 FB 01
Sessions: Allowed in all session, except Default Session 0x01 and ECU Programming Session 0x02.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_90 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_73
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1370 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1261 If the KRM is not active, when Chorus receives a KRM Activation Request, and preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 are fulfilled, the Chorus shall:
- set KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv to "1" (KRM is active), - send a positive response (6E 04 FB) to KRM Activation Request.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_73 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_131
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1371 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1262 If the Chorus receives a KRM Activation Request and the KRM is already active, then the Chorus shall send a positive response (without performing any additional action).
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_131 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_118
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: getRequestType ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 328 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ProcessRequest ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 786 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 884 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 370 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 763 If the received KRM Activation Reqest was not valid*, then the Chorus shall respond to KRM Activation Request with NRC 0x22 ConditionsNotCorrect.
Remark: *not valid means, that at least one preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 was not fulfilled.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_118 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_91
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMIsVoltageOutOfRange ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 283 Requirement is satisfied here: areConditionsValid ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 380 Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 540 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 797 Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1066 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_Motor50_u16_Rpms ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1129 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1372 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 765 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 820 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 907 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1263 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1501 KRM Deactivation Request
The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to deactivate the Roller Test Mode (set the DID 0x04FB - Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren to value '0'), by means of the service 0x2E WriteDataByIdentifier, when the following preconditions are satisfied:
KL15 is equal to ON AND KL30 Voltage is in Operating Voltage Range "c" (UBmin = 9.0V and UBmax = 16.0V as defined in ยง4.7 [VW 80000]) AND Signal ESP_v_Signal is equal to 0 AND Signal MO_QBit_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 (value: [gueltiger_Wert]) AND Signal MO_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0.
Request to write: 2E 04 FB 00
Sessions: Allowed in all session, except Default Session 0x01 and ECU Programming Session 0x02.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_91 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_93
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1373 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1264 If the KRM is active, when Chorus receives a KRM Deactivation Request, and preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 are fulfilled, the Chorus shall:
- set KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv to "0" (KRM is not active), - send a positive response (6E 04 FB) to KRM Deactivation Request.
Remark: *valid means all preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_91 were fulfilled.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_93 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_132
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1374 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1265 If the Chorus receives a KRM Deactivation Request and the KRM is already not active, the the Chorus shall send a positive response (without checking preconditions).
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_132 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_92
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 885 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 371 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 764 If the received KRM Deactivation Request was not valid*, then the ICAS1 shall respond to the KRM Deactivation Request with NRC 0x22 ConditionsNotCorrect.
Remark: *not valid means, that at least one preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_91 was not fulfilled. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_92 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_39
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/inc/KRMActivation.h line 95 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 931 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1242 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1375 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 519 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1172 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1266 The Chorus shall set the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was not active (DID 0x04FB equal to 0) and changed to active (DID 0x04FB equal to 1) (and stays active for the qualification time) AND - ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=0 (AND ESC_52 is not in timeout on F-CAN)
Signal: s_blRollenmodus_aktiv
Event Failed Timeout: 2500 ms
Priority Level: 4
Note: KPM 7921348, JIRA VWMEB-27686 The DTC shall be set to active only when the adaption changes from 0 to 1 and stays 1 for 2.5s. I.e. once set to passive by the deactivation signal this DTC shall be set to active ONLY when the adaption was reset and set again.
Note: Since KL15 is a precondition for setting adaption 0x04FB=1 the DTC can only become active when KL15 is on.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_39 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_137
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1243 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1376 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1174 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1267 Regarding SWR_L1_KRM_39:
As defined in Ereignisspeicher GW_Dia_Err_279 the DTC 0x060918 must be set to confirmed as defined above, but independent from the trip counter! Normally, the trip counter needs to be >=2 in order to set a DTC to confirmed, refer to Q-LAH_80114-3407.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_137 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_123
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: s_ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren_Message_Counter ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/inc/KRMActivation.h line 141 Requirement is satisfied here: proceedKRMActiveState ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 643 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 930 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1216 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1244 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 518 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1099 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1175 The Chorus shall reset the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as not active -> DID 0x04FB equal to 0, OR - the signal ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=1 was received 5 times in a row.
Signal: s_blRollenmodus_aktiv
Event Passed Timeout: 1500 ms
Unlearn: Counter / Eraseable
Note: Since KL15 is a precondition for resetting adaption 0x04FB=1 the DTC can only become passive when KL15 is on.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_123 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_121
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 994 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1245 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 607 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1043 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1176 The Chorus shall forward the status of the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv via s_blRollenmodusAktiv to PaCo.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set s_blRollenmodusAktiv := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set s_blRollenmodusAktiv := according to the state of DTC 0x060918.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_121 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_67
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: writeKRMFailureActiveToNVM ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 588 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 932 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1247 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1379 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 520 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 706 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1178 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1270 The Chorus shall set the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as active (DID 0x04FB equal to 1) AND - the failure by ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=1 was received (OR ESC_52 is in timeout on F-CAN). AND - KL15 is equal to ON
Remark: For DTC 0x060911 qualification time is 2500 ms, potentially it is possible, that if within this time Chorus will receive KRM Deactivation Request the DTC 0x060911 will not be stored in DEM.
Signal: KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus
Event Failed Timeout: 2500 ms
Priority Level: 6
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_67 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_136
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1248 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1380 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 707 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1179 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1271 Regarding SWR_L1_KRM_67:
As defined in Ereignisspeicher GW_Dia_Err_277 the DTC 0x060911 must be set to confirmed as defined above, but independent from the trip counter! Normally, the trip counter needs to be >=2 in order to set a DTC to confirmed, refer to Q-LAH_80114-3407.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_136 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_129
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1168 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 989 The Chorus shall reset the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as not active -> DID 0x04FB equal to 0.
Signal: KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus
Event Passed Timeout: 1500 ms
Unlearn: Counter / Eraseable
Note: Receiving ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=0 must not set the DTC to passive
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_129 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_124
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: getDTCEventStatus ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 485 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 993 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 606 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1044 The Chorus shall forward the status of the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus:
- to the flasher using Rte Port s_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus, - to AB_CAN in signal KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus signal.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus := according to the state of DTC 0x060911.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_124 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
